reference.shortdesc: Post-requisites are steps or tasks that the users should perform after completing the current task.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: The postreq element often is supported by hyperlinks to the next task or tasks.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The postreq element is specialized from the section element in the topic module.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <postreq>Notify the proctor upon completing this self-test.</postreq>
